faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.a1: NovMining is a next-gen cloud mining platform that allows you to rent hash power (GH/s) to generate USDT daily.
faqPage.a2: Your earnings accumulate in real-time. Every 12 hours, the system releases the generated amount to your withdrawable balance in Profile.
faqPage.q3: How do I withdraw my earnings?
faqPage.a3: Go to Profile > Withdraw. You must set up your wallet and security PIN before requesting.
faqPage.a4: We recommend USDT on the BEP20 (BSC) network for low fees and automatic crediting. TRC20 is also supported.
